article_title: What Are the Challenges of Affordable Health Care?
article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.

article_metadata.description: Apr. 1 -- Cleveland Clinic CEO Dr. Toby Cosgrove discusses how the Affordable Care Act impacts his medical practice with Mark Crumpton on “Bottom Line.”  (Source: Bloomberg)
